CustomField.inlineHelpText: Customers who spend more with Australia Post will have access to lower prices. Access to Tier 9+ will require approval by Pricing. Value (ex Gst) TIER 1: $2.5K - $4.99K TIER 2: $5K - $9.99K TIER 3: $10K - $19.99K TIER 4 = $20K - $49.99K TIER 5 = $50K - $124.99K TIER 6 = $125K - $249.99K TIER 7 = $250K - $499.99K TIER 8 = $500K - $999.99K TIER 9 = $1M - $2.49M TIER 10 = $2.5M - $4M TIER 11 = $5M - $9.99M TIER 12 = $10M - $19.99M TIER 13 = $20M - $39.99M TIER 14 = $40M +
CustomField.label: Tier (ex GST)
